title: Magma Fruit in Blox Fruits: Your Complete Guide

steps.title: Magma Fruit is a Rare Elemental-type Blox Fruit.
steps.content: Magma Fruit is a Rare Elemental-type Blox Fruit. You can get it for $960,000 or 1,300 Robux from the Blox Fruit Dealer. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Magma is a great fruit for grinding and doing tons of damage.
steps.content: Magma is a great fruit for grinding and doing tons of damage. Most of Magma's moves do a lot of damage, and that damage scales dramatically once you awaken the fruit. It's great for new players because it's easy to get and has low mastery requirements.

steps.title: Magma Fruit costs 14,500 to fully awaken.
steps.content: Magma Fruit costs 14,500 to fully awaken. Fragments can be obtained in several ways, but you'll most likely get them from finishing raids or defeating Sea Beasts. The order in which to awaken your moves is as follows: Z: 500 Fragments F: 2,000 Fragments X: 3,000 Fragments C: 4,000 Fragments V: 5,000 Fragments After awakening Magma Fruit, you'll get the The Red Dog title (#038).

steps.title: Magma Clap (Z)
steps.content: Magma Clap ( Z ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Damage: 3223 Cooldown: 7 seconds Description: You create two large hands out of magma, and when you clap them together, all enemies nearby will be damaged.

steps.title: Magma Eruption (X)
steps.content: Magma Eruption ( X ) Mastery cost: 45 Mastery Damage: 2865 Cooldown: 10 seconds Description: You create a huge eruption of magma underneath you. Enemies standing on top of the eruption will be launched into the air and take damage.

steps.title: Magma Fist (C)
steps.content: Magma Fist ( C ) Mastery cost: 95 Mastery Damage: 2685 Cooldown: 13 seconds Description: You create a large ball of magma that launches in the direction of the cursor. If it hits the ground, it will cause a big AoE explosion.

steps.title: Magma Meteors (V)
steps.content: Magma Meteors ( V ) Mastery cost: 140 Mastery Damage: 10742 Cooldown: 23 seconds Description: You summon 4 to 5 magma meteors that launch in the direction of the cursor. If this move hits, it will do an enormous amount of damage.

steps.title: Magma Floor (F)
steps.content: Magma Floor ( F ) Mastery cost: 10 Mastery Damage: 358 per hit, 1074 knockback damage Cooldown: 5 seconds Description: You go underground and create some lava pools that last about a second. These lava pools can stack, so running in tight circles can cause enemies to take a lot of damage. Once F is released, you will hop out of the ground, which deals damage and knocks enemies back.

steps.title: Magma Shower (Z)
steps.content: Magma Shower ( Z ) Mastery cost: 1 Mastery Fragments cost: 500 Damage: 17352 Cooldown: 6.5 seconds Description: You launch a barrage of hot magma rocks which does extremely heavy damage and leaves a number of magma puddles.

steps.title: Volcanic Assault (X)
steps.content: Volcanic Assault ( X ) Mastery cost: 45 Mastery Fragments cost: 3,000 Damage: 3531 Cooldown: 10 seconds Description: You dash forward, which leaves magma puddles in your wake. If you hit an enemy, you'll fire magma from your palm that finishes with a strong blast that deals knockback.

steps.title: Great Magma Hound (C)
steps.content: Great Magma Hound ( C ) Mastery cost: 95 Mastery Fragments cost: 4,000 Damage: 4653 Cooldown: 13 seconds Description: You launch a projectile that's shaped like a magma hound. It does a lot of damage and leaves magma puddles in its wake.

steps.title: Volcanic Storm (V)
steps.content: Volcanic Storm ( V ) Mastery cost: 140 Mastery Fragments cost: 5,000 Damage: 18277 Cooldown: 24 seconds Description: You summon a huge amount of magma in your right hand, then launch it towards the cursor. If the magma hits a surface it will explode, which causes lots of magma puddles to be formed and does an extreme amount of damage. Fun fact: This is the most powerful move in the entire game!

steps.title: Beast Ride (F)
steps.content: Beast Ride ( F ) Mastery cost: 10 Mastery Fragments cost: 2,000 Damage: 3939 Cooldown: 6 seconds Description: You create a magma beast that you can ride for about 26 seconds. It leaves a trail of magma in its wake. The beast can be used as an attack or as a mode of transportation.

steps.title: Elemental Reflex
steps.content: Elemental Reflex You are immune to all physical attacks (fighting styles, swords, and guns) unless the user has Aura or the NPC is a higher level than you.

steps.title: Lava Immunity
steps.content: Lava Immunity You are immune to lava puddles, which are found in Hot and Cold and the Magma Village, as well as in the Flame and Magma raids.

steps.title: Scorching Puddles
steps.content: Scorching Puddles Your moves will leave puddles of lava, which cause tick damage over time.

steps.title: Magmatic Feet
steps.content: Magmatic Feet Note: this passive is only present once you have Magma V2. Once you awaken a skill, you will gain the ability to walk on water by creating magma puddles.

steps.title: Pros
steps.content: Pros Easy to obtain Low mastery requirements Great for grinding and boss fights Versatile moveset Volcanic Storm is the highest damage move in the game

steps.title: Cons
steps.content: Cons Not great at aerial combat Most moves have high end-lag Moves have small hitboxes Moves are slow and can be dodged Not great with combos
